name: order_id
description: The unique identifier for the order

name: user_id
description: The identifier for the user who placed the order

name: status
description: The current status of the order (e.g., Shipped, Processing)

name: gender
description: The gender associated with the order profile

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the order was created

name: returned_at
description: Timestamp when the order was returned, if applicable

name: shipped_at
description: Timestamp when the order was shipped

name: delivered_at
description: Timestamp when the order was delivered

name: num_of_item
description: The number of items contained in the order
